item.description:
Maddy's Lounge
1639 Broadway
Rte 99
Saugus, MA 01906

......617 877 1808

We have 2 great events back to back (2FER) on Saturday 11-06-10 with DJ JODI.

*** MADDY’S LOUNGE *** 4 pm to 9 pm

An all Ladies T-Dance at Maddy’s Lounge. Dance to the sounds of D.J. JODI to her R&B, Latin and Hip Hop music from 4:00 to 9:00 PM.

*** THE HIDE AWAY @ ANTHONY’S *** 8 pm to 1:30 am

Every Saturday is LADIES night (10 min from Boston).

D.J. Jodi will be mixing their R&B, Latin & Hip Hop & Top 40 music all night long

Both locations have:
• Free Parking
• 21+, Proper I.D. required
• Plenty of seating
• Great FOOD
• HUGE dance floor
• Fully stocked Bar
• KENO (Maddy’s only)
• $7.00 cover charge (***See More INFO below***)
• Pleasant lounge area (2 separate room)
• 5 minute WALK from Malden T-Station (The Hide Away)


***If you attend the T-Dance @ Maddy’s you will receive a discount at The Hide Away***
DISCOUNT DOES NOT INCLUDE COMEDY SHOW
item.name: It's time for a 2FER
